Q_DESC:
Brute-force search is a problem solving technique which is used to find the solution by systematically enumerating all possible candidates.  

For example, it can be used for pattern matching.  Consider an input string "str" and a search string "p".  

We will try all possibilities to find whether there's any search string 'p' within the given input string "str".
TESTCASE_1:
C is a Programming Language
is a
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Text: C is a Programming Language
Pattern: is a
Pattern starts at posn 3
TESTCASE_2:
THIS IS A TEST TEXT
TEST
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Text: THIS IS A TEST TEXT
Pattern: TEST
Pattern starts at posn 11
TESTCASE_3:
